package.name: x4_sensor_config_6
package.description: The x4_sensor_config_6 package derived from x4_sensor_config_2 (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt/wiki/robots) with the addition of LIDAR Lite v3 (http://static.garmin.com/pumac/LIDAR_Lite_v3_Operation_Manual_and_Technical_Specifications.pdf) sensors, used for floor and ceiling detection, attached to the bottom and top of the platform.
package.author: Arthur Schang
